intro: Elatostema rigidum var. polycladum, commonly known as the rigid shield fern, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to eastern Australia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant features small, shield-shaped leaves that are typically arranged in a rosette pattern. Its flowers are unisexual, with separate male and female flowers on the same plant, and it produces small, dry fruits. Elatostema rigidum var. polycladum is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and forest floors.
